SELECT t.*,c.classname,s.companyname,s.prosalary,s.forsalary, (select count(*) from returnrecord r where r.student_id = t.id) returnsum FROM student t left join tbl_class c on t.class_id = c.id left join organization o on c.orgid = o.id left join student_company s on t.id = s.stuid
1=1
and t.class_id = #{id}
and o.id in (#{orgids})
and t.stuname like concat(concat('%',#{stuname}),'%')
and t.qq like concat(concat('%',#{qq}),'%')
and c.graduate = #{flag}
order BY t.id
SELECT student.*, classname,over leaschooltime FROM student JOIN tbl_class ON student.class_id = tbl_class.id WHERE student.id =#{id}

select p.* from student s ,stu_plan p where s.class_id=p.classId and NOW() BETWEEN p.begintime and p.endtime and dostatus=0 and p.id not in (SELECT DISTINCT(planid) FROM stu_evaluate WHERE stuid = #{id}) and s.id=#{id} ORDER BY p.begintime limit 0,1

SELECT * FROM tbl_class WHERE tbl_class.orgid = ( SELECT organization.id FROM student JOIN tbl_class ON student.class_id = tbl_class.id JOIN organization ON tbl_class.orgid = organization.id WHERE student.id = #{id} )

SELECT t.*,c.classname,s.companyname,s.prosalary,s.forsalary,s.xphone FROM student t left join tbl_class c on t.class_id = c.id left join student_company s on t.id = s.stuid
1=1
and t.class_id = #{id}
order BY t.id
SELECT substr(s.idno,1,2) area,count(*) count from student s,tbl_class c,organization o WHERE s.class_id=c.id and c.orgid=o.id and o.id=#{orgid} group by area

SELECT substr(s.idno,3,2) city,count(*) count from student s,tbl_class c,organization o WHERE s.class_id=c.id and c.orgid=o.id and o.id not in(#{orgid}) and LENGTH(s.idno)=18 and s.idno like '41%' group by city
